body: Disarming an explosive requires the character to succeed at a Disable Device check as if disarming a trap. The DC is usually 10, unless the person who set the explosive successfully did so with a higher disarm DC. A failure to disarm an explosive by 5 or more immediately triggers the explosive.
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Technology in the world/Skills/Disable Device/Disarm Explosive
name: Disarm Explosive
